results.title: Oral Antidiabetics and Sleep Among Type 2 Diabetes Patients: Data From the UK Biobank
results.text_hl: Our findings suggest that non-@<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ therapy may result in sleep initiation and maintenance difficulties, accompanied by a small but significant sleep @<m>DISEASE_Extranodal_Extension</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000079822 @@@extension@@@.

results.title: AMPK: Potential Therapeutic Target for Vascular Calcification
results.text_hl: @GENE_PRKAA2 @GENE_5563 @@@AMPK@@@ activators, like @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@, are associated with reduced @<m>DISEASE_Extranodal_Extension</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000079822 @@@calcification deposits@@@ in certain groups of @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@, indicating that @GENE_PRKAA2 @GENE_5563 @@@AMPK@@@ is a potential therapeutic target for @DISEASE_Vascular_Calcification @DISEASE_MESH:D061205 @@@VC@@@.

citations.NLM: Lu Y, Yuan T, Min X, Yuan Z, Cai Z. AMPK: Potential Therapeutic Target for Vascular Calcification Front Cardiovasc Med. 2021;8():670222. PMID: 34046440

results.title: Combination of Olanzapine Pamoate with Melatonin and Metformin: Quantitative Changes in Rat Adipose Tissue
results.text_hl: The association with @CHEMICAL_Melatonin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008550 @@@melatonin@@@, @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@, or the combination of @CHEMICAL_Melatonin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008550 @@@melatonin@@@ with @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ attenuated the @CHEMICAL_Olanzapine @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000077152 @@@olanzapine@@@-induced adipose @<m>DISEASE_Extranodal_Extension</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000079822 @@@deposit@@@ tissue growth.
